inclusion.criterion: Population over 18 years of age up to 70
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects with mild to moderate symptoms of respiratory illness caused by 2019 coronavirus infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed with COVID-19 by a standardized RT-PCR assay and Mild symptoms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fever, runny nose, mild cough, sore throat, malaise, headache, muscle pain, or discomfort
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No shortness of breath and No signs of more serious lower airway disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: RR <20, HR <90, oxygen saturation (pulse oximetry)> 93% in ambient air
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 12-lead ECG at rest clinically normal at the screening visit or, if abnormal, not considered clinically significant by the lead investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The subject (or legally authorized representative) provides her informed written consent before starting any study procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Understand and agree to comply with planned study procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must agree to use at least one medically accepted method of contraception
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient has a history of acne and mild hirsutism
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a history of acne and mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, and recent enlargement of hands and feet. She also has irregular menstrual cycle and nipple discharge.
